definition: Fuping County in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi
rich/abundant/wealthy
surname Fu
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ping
Fuping County in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi
pen name of Deng Xiaoping during his 1992 southern tour

sentences.english: The three side not to worry, thirteen hit Fuping hou.
sentences.chinese: 七國三邊未到憂，十三身襲富平侯。

sentences.english: Liu Minghua, a native of Fuping County of Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 劉明華，陝西省富平縣人。

sentences.english: The first impression of the Fuping Pottery Art Village was overwhelming.
sentences.chinese: 富平陶藝村給我的第一印象是十分深刻的。

sentences.english: When visiting in countryside nearby Fuping, I saw collieries and mountains with embankments.
sentences.chinese: 觀富平附近的農村時，我看到了煤礦和梯田式的大山。

sentences.english: Fuping is an exceptional place to work.
sentences.chinese: 富平是一個進行創作的特殊的地方。

sentences.english: This is the reason why FPAV decided to establish ceramic art galleries.
sentences.chinese: 因此，富平陶藝村決心要開設陶藝畫廊。

sentences.english: Also an easy walk to the town in Fuping which is very handy.
sentences.chinese: 這裏靠近富平縣城，我們可以步行去。

sentences.english: Having travelled from a big city it felt like a very familial experience when I arrived at Fuping Pottery Village.
sentences.chinese: 從大城市來到富平陶藝村，讓我有一種家的感覺。

sentences.english: My first impression of Fuping is one of change.
sentences.chinese: 此次來到富平給我的第一印象便是富平發生了變化。

sentences.english: My first impression of Fuping is one of change.
sentences.chinese: 此次來到富平給我的第一印象便是富平發生了變化。

sentences.english: The works made in Fuping I can call "Supporters of culture".
sentences.chinese: 我在富平創作的作品可稱之爲“文化的支持者”。

sentences.english: I am a 20-year-old boy and come from FuPing County, Shaanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個20歲的小夥子，來自陝西省富平縣。

sentences.english: I have enjoyed so much my time in Fuping.
sentences.chinese: 我在富平度過了很多愉快的時光。

sentences.english: I received a warm reception at the airport and on arrival here.
sentences.chinese: 從飛機場到富平我都受到了熱情的接待。

sentences.english: First day in Fuping we saw an exhibition of ceramic pillows.
sentences.chinese: 來富平的第一天，我們看到了一個陶瓷枕展。

sentences.english: The first Impression of Fuping Pottery Art Village was the warm welcome here.
sentences.chinese: 對富平的第一印象是在這裏受到了熱烈的歡迎。
